s2990: 18. Because of the woman, Qi attacked us.
s2993: Duke Xiang of Yan, first year
s2999: 30. Led the feudal lords to attack Cai, Cai collapsed, then attacked Chu, demanded the tribute of bundled mugwort.
s3000: 21. Shen Sheng, slandered by Li Ji, committed suicide. Chong'er fled to Pu, Yi Wu fled to Qu.
s3002: 16. Qi attacked us, reached Xing, had Qu Wan make the alliance.
